document.title: Pellete de liens du 27-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
badboy.media.design :: articles There comes a time when you just need to style web forms so they look different. (Tags: css webdesign accessibilite forms utilisabilite )
Google Logo Maker-Logogle ( via ) The logo of the Google style is made. Please input the character string to the text box and push the button. (Tags: logo google icones haha )
Wink - [Homepage] ( via ) Wink is a Tutorial and Presentation creation software, primarily aimed at creating tutorials on how to use software (like a tutor for MS-Word/Excel etc). (Tags: animation tutorial creation presentation )
SourceForge.net: Project Info - Flash Dynamics Engine ( via ) A free library for simulating 2D physics in Flash using Verlet integration. Autrement dit une librairie de tueur en serie, helas encore en AS1. ( Exemple d'utilisation ) (Tags: flash 2d physics lib )
